languages.text: "Он и так оказался куда полезнее, чем я рассчитывал. Видимо, он недолго состоял в культе, и психическая связь с собратьями не успела укорениться в его разуме. Иначе никакие пытки не развязали бы ему язык..." {n}Хейнрикс хмурится.{/n} "Не люблю, когда все происходит слишком просто".

"He has proved far more useful than I expected. He must have been in the cult only for a short time, and the psychic connection to his brethren had not taken root in his mind. No amount of torture would have loosened his tongue otherwise..." {n}Heinrix frowns.{/n} "Things are progressing too smoothly. I don't like it."
languages.original_text: "Он и так оказался куда полезнее, чем я рассчитывал. Видимо, он недолго состоял в культе, и психическая связь с собратьями не успела укорениться в его разуме. Иначе никакие пытки не развязали бы ему язык..." {n}Хейнрикс хмурится.{/n} "Не люблю, когда все происходит слишком просто".

No amount of torture would have loosened his tongue otherwise..." {n}Heinrix frowns.{/n} "Things are progressing too smoothly. I don't like it."

languages.text: «Ha demostrado ser mucho más útil de lo que esperaba. Debió de estar poco tiempo en el culto y la conexión psíquica con sus hermanos no arraigó del todo en su mente. Si no, no habría habido tortura en el universo capaz de hacer que hablara...». {n}Heinrix frunce el ceño.{/n} «Las cosas van demasiado bien. No me gusta».
languages.original_text: "He has proved far more useful than I expected. He must have been in the cult only for a short time, and the psychic connection to his brethren had not taken root in his mind. No amount of torture would have loosened his tongue otherwise..." {n}Heinrix frowns.{/n} "Things are progressing too smoothly. I don't like it."

traits.locale_text: «Ha demostrado ser mucho más útil de lo que esperaba. Debió de estar poco tiempo en el culto y la conexión psíquica con sus hermanos no arraigó del todo en su mente. Si no, no habría habido tortura en el universo capaz de hacer que hablara...». {n}Heinrix frunce el ceño.{/n} «Las cosas van demasiado bien. No me gusta».

languages.text: 「彼は予想以上に役に立つことがわかった。彼は魔女団に入って間もないはずで、兄弟たちとの精神的なつながりが心に根付いていなかった。いくら拷問しても彼は喋ろうとしなかっただろう」{n}ハインリックスは顔をしかめた。{/n}「物事があまりに順調に進んでいる。気に入らない…」
languages.original_text: "He has proved far more useful than I expected. He must have been in the cult only for a short time, and the psychic connection to his brethren had not taken root in his mind. No amount of torture would have loosened his tongue otherwise..." {n}Heinrix frowns.{/n} "Things are progressing too smoothly. I don't like it."

traits.locale_text: 「彼は予想以上に役に立つことがわかった。彼は魔女団に入って間もないはずで、兄弟たちとの精神的なつながりが心に根付いていなかった。いくら拷問しても彼は喋ろうとしなかっただろう」{n}ハインリックスは顔をしかめた。{/n}「物事があまりに順調に進んでいる。気に入らない…」

languages.text: “事实证明，这个人比我想象得有用得多。他肯定是前不久才刚刚加入邪教，与其他教徒之间的灵能联结还没有完全扎根。否则，哪怕再怎么严刑拷打，他也绝对不会开口……”{n}海因里希皱起了眉头。{/n}“调查过程实在太顺利了，我不喜欢这种情况。”
languages.original_text: "He has proved far more useful than I expected. He must have been in the cult only for a short time, and the psychic connection to his brethren had not taken root in his mind. No amount of torture would have loosened his tongue otherwise..." {n}Heinrix frowns.{/n} "Things are progressing too smoothly. I don't like it."

traits.locale_text: “事实证明，这个人比我想象得有用得多。他肯定是前不久才刚刚加入邪教，与其他教徒之间的灵能联结还没有完全扎根。否则，哪怕再怎么严刑拷打，他也绝对不会开口……”{n}海因里希皱起了眉头。{/n}“调查过程实在太顺利了，我不喜欢这种情况。”

languages.text: "Er war weit nützlicher als erwartet. Er war offenbar nur für kurze Zeit Mitglied des Kultes und die psionische Verbindung zu seinen Brüdern hatte in seinem Verstand noch keine Wurzeln geschlagen. Andernfalls hätte keine Folter der Welt seine Zunge gelockert ..." {n}Heinrix runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "Mir geht das alles zu langsam. Das gefällt mir nicht."
languages.original_text: "He has proved far more useful than I expected. He must have been in the cult only for a short time, and the psychic connection to his brethren had not taken root in his mind. No amount of torture would have loosened his tongue otherwise..." {n}Heinrix frowns.{/n} "Things are progressing too smoothly. I don't like it."

traits.locale_text: "Er war weit nützlicher als erwartet. Er war offenbar nur für kurze Zeit Mitglied des Kultes und die psionische Verbindung zu seinen Brüdern hatte in seinem Verstand noch keine Wurzeln geschlagen. Andernfalls hätte keine Folter der Welt seine Zunge gelockert ..." {n}Heinrix runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "Mir geht das alles zu langsam. Das gefällt mir nicht."

languages.text: « Il s'est avéré bien plus utile que prévu. Il n'avait peut-être pas intégré le culte depuis suffisamment longtemps pour que le lien psychique avec ses camarades s'enracine dans son esprit. Sinon, nous n'aurions jamais réussi à lui délier la langue… » {n}Heinrix fronce les sourcils.{/n} « Nous progressons trop facilement. Je n'aime pas ça. »
languages.original_text: "He has proved far more useful than I expected. He must have been in the cult only for a short time, and the psychic connection to his brethren had not taken root in his mind. No amount of torture would have loosened his tongue otherwise..." {n}Heinrix frowns.{/n} "Things are progressing too smoothly. I don't like it."

traits.locale_text: « Il s'est avéré bien plus utile que prévu. Il n'avait peut-être pas intégré le culte depuis suffisamment longtemps pour que le lien psychique avec ses camarades s'enracine dans son esprit. Sinon, nous n'aurions jamais réussi à lui délier la langue… » {n}Heinrix fronce les sourcils.{/n} « Nous progressons trop facilement. Je n'aime pas ça. »

languages.text: "Beklediğimden çok daha faydalı oldu. Tarikata katılmasının üstünden pek zaman geçmemiş gibi. Soydaşlarıyla arasındaki ruhsezi bağlantısı, zihninde kök salmamış. Öteki türlü ne kadar işkence edersek edelim, dilinin çözülmesi asla mümkün olmazdı..." {n}Heinrix kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "İşlerin biraz fazla pürüzsüz ilerlemesi hoşuma gitmiyor."
languages.original_text: "He has proved far more useful than I expected. He must have been in the cult only for a short time, and the psychic connection to his brethren had not taken root in his mind. No amount of torture would have loosened his tongue otherwise..." {n}Heinrix frowns.{/n} "Things are progressing too smoothly. I don't like it."
